ourvideopoker

Class OurVideoPokerFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ourvideopoker.OurVideoPoker
      • ourvideopoker.OurVideoPokerFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Videopoker

    public class OurVideoPokerFile
extends OurVideoPoker
    This class extends the OurVideoPoker to add funcionalitys to run a videopooker with a deck that is load from a file
    Author:
    Alexandre, Rui, Pedro
    See Also:
    OurVideoPoker

      DealResult deal()
      Deal method has been re-implemented because in this variation of OurVideoPoker we cannot shuffle the deck

    • Constructor Detail

      • OurVideoPokerFile

        public OurVideoPokerFile(int credits,
                         java.lang.String cardfile,
                         VideoPokerVariation variation)
                  throws java.lang.Throwable
        Constructor that receives also the file from where the deck is to be loaded
        Parameters:
        credits - initial_credits of the player
        cardfile - string with the file where the deck is located
        variation - variation of the videopoker thtat is to be played
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - Execption because of the file manipulation

    • Method Detail

      • deal

        public DealResult deal()
                throws InvalidPlayException
        Deal method has been re-implemented because in this variation of OurVideoPoker we cannot shuffle the deck
        Specified by:
        deal in interface Videopoker
        Overrides:
        deal in class OurVideoPoker
        Returns:
        DealResult object if the deal is valid
        Throws:
        the - same thing as OurVideoPoker.deal see that method for information about what it throws
        InvalidPlayException - in case of error this method throws a InvalidPlayException with a message string that can be as it follows:

        - if the player dont have credits : 'd: illegal command, player without credits'

        - if the player dont have credtis for that bet : 'd: illegal command, player without credits for that bet'

        - if the gamestate don't permit that play (gamestate diferent from 1,3 and 4) : 'd: illegal command'

        See Also:
        DealResult, OurVideoPoker
